fig, ax = plt.subplots(1, 1, figsize=(12, 8))
ax.set_xlim(-.1, 6.1)
ax.set_ylim(0, 20)
ax.set_yticks([])
ax.set_xticks([1, 2, 3, 4, 5])
ax.set_xticklabels(['Homer', 'Marge', 'Bart', 'Lisa', 'Maggie'], fontweight='bold', fontfamily='serif', fontsize=13)

# Homer
ax.bar([1], [4], color='#70D1FE')
ax.bar([1], [4], bottom=[4], color='#FAFAFA')
ax.bar([1], [4], bottom=[8], color='#FFD521')

# Marge
ax.bar([2], [6], color='#D6E69F')
ax.bar([2], [4], bottom=[6], color='#FFD521')
ax.bar([2], [8], bottom=[10], color='#107DC0')

# Bart
ax.bar([3], [2], color='#107DC0')
ax.bar([3], [4], bottom=[2], color='#F65132')
ax.bar([3], [2], bottom=[6], color='#FFD521')

# Lisa
ax.bar([4], [5], color='#F65132')
ax.bar([4], [2], bottom=[5], color='#FFD521')

# Maggie
ax.bar([5], [4], color='#70D1FE')
ax.bar([5], [2], bottom=[4], color='#FFD521')

for s in ["top","right","left", 'bottom']:
    ax.spines[s].set_visible(False)

ax.set_title('The Simpson Family', fontweight='bold', fontfamily='serif')        
    
plt.show()
